name: gpii-sort
description: A library to enable lucene-like sorting of array content.

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:node: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover tests/common-tests.js --report none --print none
scripts.posttest: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js report --root coverage --dir reports text-summary html

author: Tony Atkins <tony@raisingthefloor.org>
